Author: SecretIdentity8594
Text: I’ve had this sort of scenario before. I “solved” it by running away and >!attempting suicide.!<  I can’t help but I can say at least you have handled it better than me. Good luck, family issues are a nightmare and there’s not much you can do easily about them.

Author: alittlewiser
Text: feel this so hard - at my lowest my mom was crying about how she failed me as a parent
